name: ac-command-line-inventory-app-project
description: With this project I'm putting together all I've learned so far, about JavaScript and building applications.I am building a Command-line Inventory Application. It's an application where employees can keep track of the inventory of a store. Employees can create new items, update items, see a list of items, see details of one item and delete items.
author: Aisha C. Kleemoff
